name: S.Q.U.I.D. - Comrade Calamari
description:
Controls:

  • Backspace - Quit
  • Space - Move
  • 1 - shoot INK
  • 2 - Mimic

Mother Russia is calling!!!

Save a precious relic stolen by treacherous enemies!

Become a unique Soviet Quantum Undetectable Infiltration Device!

Use stealth and powerful abilities to fool enemy and retrieve epic
treasures. But don't get caught, or we will have to execute you for
treason. But that's ok, because there are plenty more volunteers!
